mapper.insert: insert into chat (id, name, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, name, create_time, update_time from chat
select id, name, create_time, update_time from chat
